description: The taste of this salad is different, but it grows on you. (Adapted from The Mercury News)
name: Moroccan Eggplant Salad with Preserved Lemon

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 375 F. Cut the eggplants into 1/2 -inch cubes. Line a large, long baking dish with parchment paper, and add the eggplant. Spray the top of the eggplant lightly (optional). Bake, stirring every 10 minutes, until eggplant is tender–about 30 minutes.

Place the eggplant in a serving bowl and toss it with the lemon juice, garlic, cumin, paprika, pepper flakes and preserved lemon. Refrigerate until well-chilled–the longer the better. Just before serving, sprinkle with the parsley.
